resources.string: "Nemo Wi-Fi AP da aka gaskataKuskuren nau\'in fayil. Babu damar guarawa."
""Ganowar sigina %1$s ta Wi-Fi,ko dai ayi amfani da hanyar sadarwa ta Wi-Fi, yin amfani da hanyar sadarwar zai iya jawo katsewar wucin-gadi ta hada hadar data"
"An katse sadarwar Wi-Fi. \nAhada ta cikin data ta tafi-da-gidanka? \nIdan ba ka da tsarin data, zai iya jawo maka karin cajin kudi."
An sami wannan don ap na gurin damar amincewa
"Wi-Fi Mobayil na China da aka hada, amfani da shi zai haifar da cajin kudi na Wi-Fi"
"An hada nunawa ga CMCC nan take"
"Wi-Fi za a iya budewa a yanayin jirgin sama"
"Siginan AP da aka hada na da rauni"
"Siginan masarrafin da aka hada na da rauni, kana so ka hada da wasu masarrafai amintattu? Wannan zai sa wani sashen harkar bayanan ya katse.\nNukudodin isa ga suna nan:"
"Lokacin hadawa automatikiyya da katsewa kar ya zama guda"
